column1:
The patient is recommended to receive short-term sub-acute rehab (SAR) following their surgery, which will focus on physical therapy, stair negotiation, and ADL training. The PDF indicates that the patient's discharge has been anticipated to occur within 2 to 3 days of this care plan, which also involves ambulating several times a day and encouraging deep breathing.
